QuestData.Title: Gifts of the Forest
QuestData.Description: These gorm have gone out of control! We need to stop them.$b$bI have a plan, but I cannot do it on my own. We lure the gormlings to the Banks of Life by using special totems that are drained of their anima. If you can retrieve the wood required for the totem, I can prepare the ritual.$b$bTake these pipes. Find the Culex trees growing on the banks and play a song for them. You will recognize them by their pale green leaves. The wood must be given freely for the ritual to work.
